abstrac: Over 10 years Administrative Support in Silicon Valley
bio: I'm experienced in Word, Excel, Outlook (both email and calendar), PowerPoint, Oracle, SAP, and PeopleSoft. I type approximately 45 words a minute. I have excellent customer service skills as I have managed the front desk at many local high-tech companies during various assignments. I have supported Human Resource Teams, Benefit Departments, as well as working with Facilities, Finance groups, Marketing, Sales, and various high-level executives. I have assembled interview packets, marketing materials, offer letters for job candidates, scheduled interviews, assisted with travel arrangements, processed leave of absences for employees, and been the go-to person for many types of employee and customer support questions. I believe I am an excellent candidate for this position.

bio:
LittleMonkey was founded in 2007 by Nick Koirala after many years experience in hobbyist and independent contract development.

We are based in Wellington, New Zealand.  Now days the team at LittleMonkey produces websites, mobile apps and games for customers around the world.  We have capacity and expertise in HTML5, Javascript, and PHP development for web based projects.  As well as Java, Objective-C, C/C++, C# and numerous scripting languages for mobile and game development.

We have worked on projects for organizations and individuals and have a passion for helping our customers bring their project ideas to life.

As a general rule, LittleMonkey Ltd is available for contact during office hours Monday to Friday.  Although as we are based in New Zealand we are flexible and will usually reply to email as soon as we can.  We are also available on the phone and Skype if you'd prefer.

abstrac: In Form Creations was founded in 2011 in Longmont, Colorado. We are a multimedia graphic design and web development studio serving the Front Range of Colorado and beyond.
bio:
In Form Creations made its start in 2011 when it was founded in Longmont, Colorado. We started developing small custom Joomla websites and have now grown to manage a nationwide clientele spanning from California to New York. These clients rely on our expertise in the CMS WordPress and Joomla, HTML + CSS, and the Adobe Creative Suite. Our services include web design, web development, graphic design, 3D animation and modeling, internet marketing, SEO and more.

From our humble beginnings In Form Creations has grown to become a top performer in the industry with fresh and modern designs that deliver real results to business owners. So many companies offer services with no knowledge or experience to back it up. With over three years of experience in the industry, we are prepared to offer you real solutions with measurable results.

We are excited to announce the opening of our first local office in downtown Frederick, Colorado at 451 Oak Street, Suite 202B. Come on down and check us out!

abstrac: Professional Mobile App & Web Backend Developer
bio:
Having 5+ years of experience in mobile application development. Since then, I have been creating clean, elegant and creative mobile applications and web back-ends. I’ve worked on everything from GPS, Maps, and Animations in both Android and iOS. I’ve learned and tried to master language such as JAVA, Kotlin, Objective C, Swift, JS, PHP, NodeJS  and much more, nearly most of the programming language in recent times.

I’ve also worked with many popular third-party API(Application Programming Interface) like Facebook, Twitter, google APIs, Firebase and so.

When I build any application, I always try to be unique and push the boundaries.


Check out my Portfolio here: manisoftsolutions.com/portfolio.

bio:
We are FYA: The Online Conversationalists. We are a Digital Marketing
Agency. We are a group of young enthusiasts, passionate about
everything digital. We understand the importance of a good looking
website, the impression created by your logo, the simplicity required in
the functionality, the listening part to Social Networks and we know the
world is going mobile and we have the road map for you to conquer that
too. We are all about creating a complete channel of communication in
the digital world.
We are story tellers, architects, designers, developers, all put together we
are the calm in the digital chaos; we are FYA, here For Your Assistance.
